synopsis.text:
Erika's and Nagi's lives take an unexpected turn when they discover they were swapped at birth. As high school students with different backgrounds, Nagi being an excellent student and Erika a social media sensation, they find themselves entangled in a bizarre situation. Their parents, eager to correct the past, propose an unconventional solution: an engagement between the two. Despite their initial reluctance, Nagi and Erika are unable to sway their parents' decision, leading to a complicated and chaotic living arrangement.

While navigating this new reality, Nagi harbors feelings for his classmate Hiro, while Erika remains determined to defy her father's expectations. In an attempt to maintain some control over their lives, the pair agrees to keep their relationship strictly platonic. As they try to balance their personal lives, academic pursuits, and the looming engagement, Nagi and Erika embark on a tumultuous and hilarious romantic comedy filled with unexpected twists and turns. Will they be able to find their own paths to happiness amidst the chaos? Only time will tell.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
